title: Get a 1-year Costco membership and a $40 gift card at one of the lowest prices of the year.
content:
Macworld

If you regard Black Friday as your annual shopping Super Bowl, then you’re probably already thinking about how to make the most out of the top Black Friday deals and retailers. Since Costco is already acknowledged as one of the year-round kings when it comes to big savings on virtually everything, a one-year Costco Gold Star membership at a Black Friday price of just $60 is like a super-vortex of optimized savings. And just to sweeten the deal, shoppers will also get a $40 Digital Costco Shop Card* to make the offer a true slam-dunk no-brainer. This deal is rated 5/5 stars by verified purchasers. 

Whether you’re looking at a membership for yourself or to give one as a gift, a Costco subscription is a massive money-saving for virtually any household. With over 500 Costco warehouses across the U.S., members can find almost anything they’re looking for, from groceries and household necessities to gifts, electronics, jewelry, and beyond. 

As a Costco Gold Star member, you’ll also enjoy access to all the other super-handy services under the Costco umbrella, like Costco Pharmacies, Costco Optical, and Costco Hearing Aid Centers for savings on prescription drugs and more. 

With Costco Travel, members can enjoy extra savings on hotel reservations, cruises, and other travel perks. And since the cost of fueling up is a huge expense in most households, there’s even the ever-popular Costco Gas Station to fill your tank at one of the lowest prices in town. 

New members can take advantage of this deal, including a Gold Star household card good for 12 months, along with that $40 Digital Costco Shop Card to use on any of your favorite goods. It’s a $100 value on sale for just $60, and there’s no coupon needed. This deal runs through November 27th only. 

 

Costco 1-Year Gold Star Membership + a $40 Digital Costco Shop Card – $60

Get it all for $60

Prices subject to change

*To receive a Digital Costco Shop Card, you must provide a valid email address at the time of sign-up. If you elect not to provide a valid email address, a Digital Costco Shop Card will not be emailed. Valid only for nonmembers for their first year of membership. Limit one per household. Nontransferable and may not be combined with any other promotion. New members will receive their Digital Costco Shop Card by email within 2 weeks of sign-up. Costco Shop Cards are not redeemable for cash, except as required by law. Digital Costco Shop Cards are not accepted at Gas Stations, Car Washes, or Food Court Kiosks. A Costco membership is $60 a year. An Executive Membership is an additional $60 upgrade fee a year. Each membership includes one free Household Card. May be subject to sales tax. Costco accepts all Visa cards, as well as cash, checks, debit/ATM cards, EBT and Costco Shop Cards. Departments and product selection may vary.
